name: Personal Study
description:
How to add variety to the university routine if you are a young, hot student, ready for risky adventures and open to new experiences? The answer is obvious, if you study at The University of Arcane Arts and accidentally found out about a mystery hidden inside one of its buildings, which was closed many years ago for unknown reasons.
However, descending into the gloomy dungeons, our heroine did not anticipate what temptations her mind and body would face. Maybe the wise scholars were right to hide the sinister department from prying eyes?

Personal Study is an adult adventure game where you will explore an abandoned research facility of elven university of magic and investigate its mysteries.

  • Explore the majestic halls in search of traces of ancient magic.



  • Solve puzzles using logic and special abilities.



  • Learn to summon extraplanar creatures.



  • Make a collection of cosplay outfits and discover new ways to exploit summoned demons for your own delight.



  • Indulge in forbidden pleasures with species from other worlds.
